Text: Anyone know if this is password locked yet?
@N3xS...I followed all the steps but when I start the game,it says empty slot on the LOAD screen. I have both dsave0 and dsave4 file in the my documents folder and the SKIDROW folder.

@tufel : In the "C:UsersDocumentsMy GamesDarksiders2" you have to copy the whole "English" folder of the save you want to play with, not only the "dsave0.dsav" and "dsave4.dsav". So both files would be inside the English folder, and the english folder will be inside the darksiders 2 folder.
But for Skidrow, you only copy the two files, not the English folder, and it should work.
